Title: Attribution Analyst (Xpanse)
RoleDescription:
Your CareerWhat is a companys Attack Surface? Attack Surface refers to all possible internet-facing access points that a bad actor can use to hack into a companys system.  In this role, you will primarily focus on research analytics. Each analyst is responsible for mapping out what parts of an organization are vulnerable and need to be tested for security vulnerabilities. Using various internal and external research techniques, Attack Surface Analysis analysts determine which internet-facing assets belong to a company of interest by investigating those assets' registration information, such as domains, certificates, and IP networks.
